description: Monitor for access to files that may indicate attempts to coerce a user into providing authentication information. Analytic 1 - Suspicious access to files known to be used for forced authentication attacks. index=security sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=4663 ObjectName="*\\path\\to\\suspicious\\file*" | where match(ObjectName, "(?i)\\(.*\\.)?(lnk|scf|url|doc|dot|xls|ppt|pdf|scf|html)$")
